_description: Animate product photography for commercial videos
_usage: Transform product shots into dynamic commercial footage

parameters.negativePrompt: blur, distortion, logo, text, fingerprints, dust

shot.movement: [slow orbit | slow dolly_in | static with light sweep]

subject.reference: The product shown in the input image

input_image.description: Earbuds and charging case on dark reflective surface, rim lighting

subject.reference: The earbuds and case from the image
subject.highlight: LED indicators, seamless design, premium materials

action.secondary: light sweeps across surface highlighting contours

lighting.preserve: Rim lighting, dark background, reflective surface
lighting.animate: Subtle light sweep following product rotation

style.color_grade: High contrast, deep blacks, crisp whites

audio.sfx: SFX: subtle whoosh, satisfying click at end
audio.music: Music: modern electronic, minimal, premium feel, soft pulse

input_image.description: Frosted glass bottle with gold cap on marble surface, soft lighting

subject.reference: The serum bottle from the image
subject.maintain: Glass texture, gold accents, ambient reflections
subject.highlight: Dropper mechanism, amber liquid visible through glass

action.secondary: cap lifts revealing dropper with single serum drop
action.timing: 0-4s approach, 4-6s cap lifts, 6-8s serum drop glistens

lighting.preserve: Soft natural side lighting, warm tones
lighting.animate: Light catching the serum drop as it forms

audio.sfx: SFX: glass cap lifting, liquid drop forming
audio.music: Music: soft piano, ethereal, spa-like ambience

input_image.description: Watch on black velvet, dramatic lighting on dial

subject.maintain: Metal finish, crystal reflections, dial details
subject.highlight: Second hand movement, light on metal surfaces

lighting.animate: Very subtle light crawl across dial face

style.color_grade: High contrast, silver and black, warm gold accents

audio.sfx: SFX: precise ticking, mechanical movement sounds
audio.music: Music: minimal orchestral, single cello note held

input_image.description: Fresh coffee in ceramic cup, beans scattered, rustic setting

subject.reference: The coffee cup and beans from the image
subject.maintain: Cup position, bean arrangement, rustic background
subject.highlight: Rising steam, liquid surface, bean sheen

lighting.animate: Steam catches light as it rises

style.color_grade: Rich browns, warm highlights, deep shadows

audio.sfx: SFX: liquid being poured at start, gentle steam hiss

image_requirements: Proper lighting setup (rim, side, or key light)
No existing text, logos, or watermarks
motion_guidelines: Slow movements work best for products
One movement type per clip (orbit OR dolly, not both)
Match camera movement to product shape
audio_tips: Use premium-sounding music for luxury products
Match audio energy to brand positioning
